location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 34 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports the arrival of the BetseySnow (Captain David Phillips) and Bombay MerchantSnow (Captain Charles Virtue). The letter reports news that the French at Myhie [Mahe] capitulated to Colonel Braithwaite and concludes 'the French have not now one flag flying in India'.
